item.title: Minutes - March 4, 2022
item.description: Attendance Sponsors Anna Seat Aaron Smith Officers Aaron “Radar” Bishop - President Matthew Jordan - Vice President Kaeli “Sushi” Maxwell - Treasurer Goldie Snow - Secretary Kayla Ford - Grievance Officer Sadie Stone-McCarty - Historian Attendees Karley Jones Ethan King Danica Rowe Ariana Snell Call To Order Time: 12:35 PM Approval of Previous Minutes Previous minutes for both the special meeting and the previous meeting were discussed.

item.title: Special Minutes - February 18, 2022
item.description: Preface This is a special meeting to vote in the vacant positions in the club. Attendance Sponsors Anna Seat Aaron Smith Officers Aaron “Radar” Bishop - President Matthew Jordan - Vice President Kaeli “Sushi” Maxwell - Treasurer Goldie Snow - Historian Attendees Kayla Ford Karley Jones Ethan King Danica Rowe Ariana Snell Sadie Stone-McCarty Call To Order Time: 12:44PM Approval of Previous Minutes N/A

item.title: Minutes - February 11, 2022
item.description: Preface As no formal minutes were recorded, the following is a summation of notes as remembered by the author. Attendance Sponsors Anna Seat Aaron Smith Officers Aaron “Radar” Bishop - President Matthew Jordan - Vice President Kaeli “Sushi” Maxwell - Treasurer Reason: Work Ryland Asher - Secretary Reason: No longer a member True Williams - Grievance Officer Reason: No longer a member Goldie Snow - Historian Attendees Kayla Ford Karley Jones Reason: Prior obligations Ethan King Danica Rowe Reason: Prior obligations Ariana Snell Sadie Stone-McCarty Call To Order Time: 12:39 PM
